name: Sneaky Elvis in The Amazing Jailhouse Escape
name_original: Sneaky Elvis in The Amazing Jailhouse Escape
description:
Sneaky Elvis has been imprisoned in the Jailhouse of Rock, but fortunately he will make an Amazing Escape. Uh hu hu!

Controls:

Press space to start/restart game.

Change facing: W,A,S,D

Move: Alternate Left/Right arrowkeys in time with the music

Don't let the guards hear your. Guard Dogs will cause alarm, but other prisoners will aid your escape, by distracting the guards.


Credits:

Anders Rauff-Nielsen: Game Design + Elvish impersonation

Ditte Deenfeldt: Game Design + Art

Rasmus Heeger Jensen: Code + Coffee

Patrik Jarlestam: Audio + Awesome
